name: Death World
description:
Join our Discord!
https://discord.gg/cwMVGy8

What is Death World
Death World is a Coop Open World Survival Game which is set in a near apocalyptic future.

Does this Game has a Story
Imagine: The World is at War. People have fled into bunkers trying to escape the consequences of this war. They were promised to be free as soon as the war would be over.
However, after several years of being stuck in the bunker and waiting for better days, they start turning on each other. Food is becoming scarce and medicine is urgently needed. So, they decide to open the doors themselves. You are one of them. But you are not one of the occupants.
You are a security guard for the Bunkers.


What can i do in Death World?
That is completely up to you!
Your primary goal is to survive!
Craft, loot, raid, kill. Do whatever is needed to survive!

When will Death World be available
Sometime in 2020. Please be aware that we are not able to provide you with a specific date at the moment!

Is this a Single Player or a Mulitplayer Game
Death World can be played alone. But we recommend playing with your friends or with other people using the FastGame Function in the multiplayer menu for a more immersive and fun experience!
